example.name: prepositional Arg1
example.text: [*-1] Keeping the mood light , the two then chanted and chortled their way through some murderous polyrhythms , devised [*]by Mr. Douglas as an alternative to Hindemith 's dry theory-teaching techniques , and then , with Mr. Gomez , soared and improvised on the composer 's tight `` Bebop Etudes . ''
